statements: SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE course = 'Math';
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_year FROM Students WHERE enrollment_year >= 2019;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_age < 25 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course FROM Students WHERE student_age BETWEEN 20 AND 25 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20 ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE course = 'Mathematics' ORDER BY student_age DESC
SELECT student_name, enrollment_year FROM Students WHERE enrollment_year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2021 ORDER BY enrollment_year DESC, student_name ASC
SELECT student_id, student_name, enrollment_year FROM Students WHERE student_age < 25 AND course = 'Physics' ORDER BY enrollment_year ASC
SELECT student_name, student_age, course FROM Students WHERE course LIKE '%Science%' ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_grade FROM academic_records ORDER BY course_grade DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE date_of_birth >= '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM academic_records WHERE course_grade IN ('A', 'B');
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, course_name FROM academic_records WHERE course_grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, course_name FROM students INNER JOIN academic_records ON students.student_id = academic_records.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT * FROM StudentProfile;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM StudentProfile WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM AcademicRecord WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT course_name, professor_name FROM Course ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth, address FROM StudentProfile WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM StudentProfile WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_name, grade FROM StudentProfile JOIN AcademicRecord ON StudentProfile.student_id = AcademicRecord.student_id;
SELECT student_name, grade, semester FROM StudentProfile JOIN AcademicRecord ON StudentProfile.student_id = AcademicRecord.student_id WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B');
SELECT course_name, professor_name FROM Course ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth, address FROM StudentProfile WHERE date_of_birth < '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date, grade FROM Enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade, semester FROM Grades WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM Students LEFT JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id;

SELECT first_name, last_name, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id AND Enrollments.course_id = Grades.course_id;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, enrollment_date, grade FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT course_name, instructor, COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM Courses LEFT JOIN Enrollments ON Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id GROUP BY course_name, instructor;
SELECT first_name, last_name, semester, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE semester = 'Fall' ORDER BY grade DESC, last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT student_id, major FROM Students WHERE major='Computer Science';
SELECT * FROM Courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM Students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;

SELECT Students.first_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Courses.instructor = 'Dr. Smith';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE Grades.grade = 'A';

SELECT Addresses.address_line, Addresses.city, Addresses.state, Addresses.postal_code, Students.first_name, Students.last_name FROM Addresses JOIN Students ON Addresses.student_id = Students.student_id WHERE Addresses.state = 'NY';
